channel.title: Text Analysis on Chris's Fun Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Text Analysis on Chris's Fun Data Blog

item.title: Easter Sermon Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Objective: I was curious what a sermon would look like doing text analysis with the Syuzhet Package (https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/syuzhet/vignettes/syuzhet-vignette.html). I chose Pastor Tim Knight’s Easter message. I obatined the mp4 off of the Church website and converted it to text using an application (I didn’t know that could be done). I then uploaded the text into R and began the analysis which can be seen below.
